meanings.sent1: The paries of the room separated the kitchen from the living room.
meanings.sent2: The paries of the castle were thick and sturdy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb the paries, thinking it was a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: Her emotional paries protected her from getting hurt again.
meanings.sent5: The paries of the fortress stood tall, guarding the kingdom.

meanings.definition: The outer wall of a hollow organ or structure.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the paries of the stomach for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: The paries of the cave were covered in ancient drawings.
meanings.sent3: The paries of the balloon animal popped, causing a funny deflation.
meanings.sent4: The paries of the beehive buzzed with activity.
meanings.sent5: The paries of the tunnel echoed with footsteps, creating an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The paries of the skin protect the body from external harm.
meanings.sent2: The paries of the leaf help in photosynthesis.
meanings.sent3: The paries of the cake were so thin, it melted in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The paries of the cloud seemed to glow in the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The paries of the flower petal were delicate and beautiful.
